#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int trial;
    cin>>trial;
    while(trial--)
    {
                  int num,i,j,sumr=0,co=0,p=-1,fl=0;
                  cin>>num;
                  int arr[num+1][num];
                  for(i=0;i<num;i++)
                  arr[num][i]=0;
                  for(i=0;i<num;i++)
                  {
                                    sumr=0;
                                    for(j=0;j<num;j++)
                                    {
                                                      cin>>arr[i][j];
                                                      arr[num][j]+=arr[i][j];
                                                      sumr+=arr[i][j];
                                                      }
                                    if((sumr%2)==1)
                                    {                                 
                                    co++;
                                    if(co==1)
                                    p=i;
                                    else if(co>1)
                                    fl=1;              
                                    }
                                    
                  }
                  int x=0,l=-1;
                       for(i=0;i<num;i++)
                       if((arr[num][i]%2)==1)
                       {
                                        x++;
                                        if(x==1)
                                        l=i;
                                        else if(x>1)
                                        fl=1;
                                        }
                  if((co==0)&&(x==0))
                  cout<<"1\n";
                  else if((co==1)&&(x==1))
                  cout<<"("<<p+1<<","<<l+1<<")\n";
                  else
                  cout<<"0\n";
                          
    }
    
    return 0;
}
